name: Gusty's adventure
description:
Help gusty to get funding so he can see his parents again by gaining funding you will help build more wind turbines, in turn saving the planet.

please give funding to all sciences and to the climate scientists trying to save us all.

The inspiration for this game was from an old film called the brave little toaster also from retro platformer games that provide a challenge but also leave you with a sense of accomplishment.

we choose to do a kid-focused style of game as it allows us to target kids as the main demographic teaching them about the gusty story, this, in turn, makes sure kids all over the world are focused on funding and knowing the impact it can have, it also Anthropomorphises wind turbines for children so when they are out they can see gusty with his family around the countrysides.

this also allows for kids to teach their parents and keep them straight for the better allowing our teaching to be passed on through children of the world just like what they did with children and seatbelts in the 80s.
